text: Drama, drama, drama! Farrah Abraham revealed in a new interview why she walked off the set of the season premiere of Marriage Boot Camp : Reality Stars Family Edition. Things got tense on the Friday, April 28, episode when the Teen Mom OG star mentioned her 2010 physical altercation with her now - estranged mother, Debra Danielsen. Danielsen was arrested for the incident after she allegedly choked and hit her then 18 - year - old daughter, TMZ reported at the time. She was later charged with assault in an Iowa court.
